reviewText: A picture is worth a thousand words.  Good companion piece to the Mandrell book on tube flies.  Buy these together.

A very good, detailed instruction for tube fly tying.  The downfall, only 5 patterns with little variation among the 5.  Would like to have had more patterns/tying methods to view.  Also would be nice to have some sources for tube flies materials mentioned.  Little pricey for what you get.
